tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Microfinance_Loans (
 loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 loan_amount DECIMAL,
 loan_date DATE,
 entrepreneur_name VARCHAR(50),
 country VARCHAR(50),
 success_evaluation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE microfinance_loans (
 loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 borrower_id UUID,
 loan_amount DECIMAL,
 loan_date DATE,
 repayment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE impact_evaluation (
 evaluation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 loan_id UUID,
 empowerment_score DECIMAL,
 impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE women_entrepreneurs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  loan_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
 loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 loan_amount DECIMAL,
 loan_date DATE,
 borrower_id INT,
 impact_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE borrowers (
 borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 country VARCHAR(50),
 age INT
);

CREATE TABLE businesses (
 business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 sector VARCHAR(50),
 revenue DECIMAL,
 borrower_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_evaluation (
 evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 loan_id INT,
 borrower_id INT,
 impact_metric VARCHAR(50),
 evaluation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  repayment_rate DECIMAL,
  loan_date DATE,
  borrower_id INT,
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE borrowers (
  borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  occupation VARCHAR(50),
  income DECIMAL
);
